A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As much as I love Star Wars\, this one will not go down as a \"great\" or even \"good\" SW Film.  However\, the sound/picture/effects and detail in this film are hands down amazing. This looks and sounds like a Star Wars movie. But the story and characters are just bad. Rey is a Mary Sue. Rose is boring and her subplot with Finn is garbage. This movie unfortunately also seems to be fueled by political agenda. Hopefully things can turn around.
